publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3030 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) (Order) 2002, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3030 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Valuation and Rating (Exempted Classes) (Scotland) (Order) 2002, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
